code: import React from'react';import Project from'./Project';import'./Projects.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const weatherOutDes='This web-based tool visualizes weather data, allowing users to explore temperature and humidity trends over time using Chart.js.
